txt.en: 'The forest is haunted, I say. Every time we go down there, the spirits come up here....'
'They have long believed these woods to be haunted, and now I believe they will take this opportunity to leave them.'
An Unpleasant Meal
You poured Lithuifin's draught into the giants' stew-pot
'This meal should be memorable to the giants....'
The encampment of the giants is at Amon Môth, south and west of the Eavespires.\n\nLithuifin has asked you to pour his draught into the giants' stew.
Lithuifin is at the Eavespires, north and east of Amon Môth.\n\nYou should return to Lithuifin with your report.
'Nay! The fell spirits are in my stew pot now? I told the chieftain it was a bad idea to go into the forest.'
'Something smells good!'
Pour Lithuifin's draught into the giants' stew-pot
'Where did all the pretty colours come from?'
You poured Lithuifin's draught into the giants' stew-pot
'The colours are all swirling....makes me dizzy!'
'What is wrong with you all? There is nothing there!'
'...Head feels funny....'
Talk to Lithuifin at the Eavespires
'I will smash the swirling lights! Die, flickery things!'
'What is that? Spiders? Aagh!'
'Nay! They just break into more lights! Argh!'
'They are coming out of the forest! Thousands of them! Keep them away!'
'Get them away from me! Nooooo!'
'They cannot be killed! Keep them off of me!'
'Aaaaahhh!'
'My stomach's growling already. Let me at that food.'
A Stone-giant Warrior greedily gobbles down the tainted stew.
Lithuifin the Elf is concerned with the giants which have been ruining the forest.
'Why is the ground moving?'
'It is the spirits again! They are back!'
'This time I will destroy them all!'
'They are biting me! Get them off!'
'Nooo! Leave me alone!'
'The food is ready? It is about time!'

'The giants tend to gather each day for a large meal somewhere near the southern end of their encampment where they have placed an enormous stew-pot.

'Your goal is simplicity itself -- make your way quietly to the pot in their midst and slip this into their meal, then escape before you are stepped on.

'If you can manage to stay nearby, you may find the events to follow amusing.'
